subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marek Zidlicky and David Clarkson scored 14 seconds apart in the game’s last two minutes, leading the Devils to a 2-1 victory at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Marek Zidlicky and David Clarkson scored 14 seconds apart in the game’s last two minutes, leading the Devils to a 2-1 victory at Nassau Coliseum.
